arabicText: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ رَضُوا۟ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَقَالُوا۟ حَسْبُنَا ٱللَّهُ سَيُؤْتِينَا ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ رَٰغِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
How	 excellent	 it	 would	 be,	 if	 they	 were	
pleased	 with	 what	 Allah and	 His	 Noble	
Messenger	 had	 given	 them	 and	 said,	
“Allah suffices	 us;	Allah will	 now	 give	 us	
by	 His	 munificence,	 and	 (so	 will)	 Allah’s	
Noble	Messenger	- and	towards	Allah only	
are	we	inclined.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	kya	achchha	hota	agar	woh	is	par	rāzi	
hote	 jo	 Allah	 o	 Rasool	 ne	 unko	 diya	 aur	
kehte	 hameiñ	 Allah	 kāfi	 hai	 ab	 deta	 hai	
hameiñ	 Allah	 apne	 fazl	 se	 aur	 Allah	 ka	
Rasool	 hameiñ	 Allah	 hi	 ki	 taraf	 raghbat	
hai.

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّمَا ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتُ لِلْفُقَرَآءِ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ عَلَيْهَا وَٱلْمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَفِى ٱلرِّقَابِ وَٱلْغَـٰرِمِينَ وَفِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ ۖ فَرِيضَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
The	 obligatory	 charity	 *	 is	 only	 for	 the	
destitute	and	the	really	needy,	and	those	who	collect	it,	and	for	those	in	whose	hearts	the	love	
of	Islam	needs	to	be	instilled	**,	and	to	free	slaves,	and	to	debtors,	and	in	Allah's	cause	***,	and	
to	the	traveller;	this	is	decreed	by	Allah;	and	Allah is	All	Knowing,	Wise.	(*	This	applies	only	to	
Zakat.**	The	new	convert	to	Islam.***	To	the	fighter	having	no	provisions	for	holy	war.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Zakāt	to	inhiñ	logoñ	ke	liye	hai	mohtāj	aur	
nire	nādār	aur	jo	usey	tehseel	(wusool)	karke	lāyeñ	aur	jinke	diloñ	ko	islam	se	ulfat	di	jāye	aur	
gardaneiñ	chudāne	meiñ	aur	qarz	dāroñ	ko	aur	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	aur	musāfir	ko	yeh	thehrāya	
huwa	hai	Allah	ka	aur	Allah	Ilm-o-Hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَمِنْهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ ٱلنَّبِىَّ وَيَقُولُونَ هُوَ أُذُنٌۭ ۚ قُلْ أُذُنُ خَيْرٍۢ لَّكُمْ يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَيُؤْمِنُ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	among	them	(the	hypocrites)	are	those	who	trouble*	the	Herald	of	the	Hidden	(the	Prophet)	
and	say,	“He	is	only	ears**”;	say	“He	is	a	listener	for	your	good,	he	believes	in	Allah and	believes	
in	what	the	Muslims	say,	and	is	a	mercy	for	the	Muslims	among	you”;	and	for	those	who	trouble	
the	Noble	Messenger	of	Allah,	is	a	painful	punishment.	(*To	disrespect	/	trouble	the	Holy	Prophet	
– peace	and blessings	be	upon	him	– is	blasphemy.	**He	believes	whatever	he	is	told.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	un	meiñ	koi	woh	haiñ	ke	in	ghaib	ki	khabrein	dene	wāle	 (Nabi)	ko	satāte	haiñ	aur	kehte	
haiñ	woh	to	kān	haiñ	tum	farmāo		tumhāre	bhale	ke	liye	kān	haiñ	Allah	par	Imān	lāte	haiñ	aur	
musalmanoñ		ki	bāt	par	yaqeen	karte	haiñ	aur	jo	tum	meiñ	Musalman	haiñ	unke	wāste	raḥmat	
haiñ	aur	woh	jo	Rasoolullah	ko	izā	dete	haiñ	unke	liye	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb	hai

arabicText: يَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ لِيُرْضُوكُمْ وَٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ أَحَقُّ أَن يُرْضُوهُ إِن كَانُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. They	 swear	 by	Allah in	 your	 presence	in	
order	 to	 please	 you;	whereas	Allah - and	
His	 Noble	 Messenger	 - had	 more	 right	
that	they	should	have	pleased	Him	if	they	
had	faith.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tumhāre	 sāmne	 Allah	 ki	 qasam	 khāte	
haiñ	ke	tumheiñ		rāzi	karleiñ	aur	Allah-oRasool	ka	haq	zāid	 tha	ke	usey	rāzi	karte	
agar	Imān	rakhte	they.

arabicText: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ مَن يُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدًۭا فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخِزْىُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Do	 they	 not	 know	 that	 for	 one	 who	
opposes	 Allah and	 His	 Noble	 Messenger,	
is	 the	 fire	of	hell,	 to	remain	in	it	 forever?	
This	is	the	greatest	humiliation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	unheiñ	khabar	nahi	ke	jo	khilāf		kare	
Allah	 aur	 uske	 Rasool	 ka	 to	 uske	 liye	
jahannam	ki	āag	hai	ke	hamesha	us	meiñ	
rahe	ga	yehi	badi	ruswāyi	hai.

arabicText: يَحْذَرُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ أَن تُنَزَّلَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُورَةٌۭ تُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ قُلِ ٱسْتَهْزِءُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخْرِجٌۭ مَّا تَحْذَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. The	 hypocrites	 fear	 for	 a	 chapter	 being	
revealed	 regarding	 them,	 which	 may	
disclose	 what	 is	 hidden	 in	 their	 hearts;	
say,	 “Keep	 mocking;	 Allah will	 certainly	
disclose	what	you	fear.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Munafiq	 darte	 haiñ	 ke	 un	 par	 koi	 soorat	
aisi	 utre	 jo	 un	 ke	 diloñ	 ki chhupi	 jatā	 de	
tum	 farmāo	 	 hañse	 jāo	 Allah	 ko	 zaroor	
zāhir	karna	hai	jiska	tumheiñ		dar	hai.

arabicText: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُمْ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّمَا كُنَّا نَخُوضُ وَنَلْعَبُ ۚ قُلْ أَبِٱللَّهِ وَءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَرَسُولِهِۦ كُنتُمْ تَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 you	 ask	 them,	 they	 will	 say,	 “We	
were	 just	 having	 fun	 and	 pastime”;	 say,	
“What!	You	mock	at	Allah and	His	 verses	
and	His	Noble	Messenger?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 aey	 Mehboob!	 Agar	 tum	 un	 se	
poochho	 to	 kaheñge	 ke	 hum	 to	 yooñ	 hi	
hañsi	 khel	 meiñ	 they	 tum	 farmāo kya	
Allah	aur	uski	Āayatoñ aur	uske	Rasool	se	hanste	ho
